channel.title: All Registered Polls for the National Assembly
channel.description: All Registered Polls for the National Assembly

item.title: Opinion Poll by Delo Stik for Delo, 2–5 May 2018 – Voting Intentions
item.description:
• Slovenska demokratska stranka: 19.2–24.8%
  • Stranka modernega centra: 4.6–7.8%
  • Socialni demokrati: 11.2–15.8%
  • Levica: 6.5–10.2%
  • Nova Slovenija–Krščanski demokrati: 5.6–9.2%
  • Demokratična stranka upokojencev Slovenije: 3.3–6.2%
  • Stranka Alenke Bratušek: 2.7–5.4%
  • Slovenska ljudska stranka: 1.8–4.1%
  • Slovenska nacionalna stranka: 1.6–3.7%
  • Glas za otroke in družine–Nova ljudska stranka Slovenije: 0.3–1.4%
  • Lista Marjana Šarca: 16.9–22.3%
